definitions.title: n. pr. loc.
definitions.body: city between the border of Damascus and that of Hamath Ez Eze 47:16; identif. by v. Kasteren:Revue Bibl. Internat. 1895, 23 ff. with Khirbet Sanbariye on the river Ḥâṣbâni, SW. of Hermon, cf. Buhl:Geogr. 67, 238, but this appar. too far SW.; LXX Sebram, A Sefram. A city Šabara’in is named in Bab. Chron.:i. 28 (Schr:KB ii. 276); but location not given.
